document_data.name: Arphoind Bleth
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite dragon annual/2000/After the Dragon: The Kingdom of Cormyr Today|65}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Arphoind Bleth''' was the leader of the [[Bleth]] family around the time of [[Azoun IV]]'s death. He was the second known Arphoind of the Bleth family, likely named after [[Arphoind Bleth I]] from the earliest days of [[Cormyr]].
